name: DJ Varnish's Xclusive EFX Pack Vol. 3
name_original: DJ Varnish's Xclusive EFX Pack Vol. 3
description:
A twin stick rhythm game in which you play as a DJ triggering sound effects over the track to keep the party hype.

A homage to Gitaroo Man.

Requires a gamepad to play.

Made by Ian Sundstrom and Ian Pottmeyer for Train Jam 2017.
